name: woodland scarf
notes:
introducing the woodland scarf crochet pattern, perfect for all skill levels. using a larger hook with a weight 3 yarn creates a beautiful, lightweight, airy fabric. the fringe adds a stylish detail. stay warm and comfortable this winter.
  
**materials needed-**
  
• yarn: mandala (dk weight, 590-610 yards) or any weight #3 yarn
• hook: 9mm (us size 13.0)
